item.title: Fallout 4 Next Gen Update Fixes a Long-Standing Softlock
item.description:
Highlights

  • Next-gen update for Fallout 4 fixes notorious Codsworth bug, making early main quest content accessible once more.
  • Fallout series popularity surge causes server strains on Nexus Mods, millions of new downloads due to TV show hype.
  • Despite F4SE compatibility issues, next-gen update brings new Creation Club content and fixes Codsworth bug. Fans anticipate Fallout 5 news.

The next-gen update for Fallout 4 fixes a notorious glitch from the game. Fallout 4 was released in 2015 and remains one of Bethesda Game Studios' most popular works. It received critical acclaim and continues to be loved by gamers, but especially recently, the Fallout series has experienced a boost in attention from fans old and new, thanks to its new TV Show.

The Fallout TV show being a big hit has led to a resurgence in the series, making the games so popular that platforms which were ill-equipped for such high player counts have had to accommodate quickly. Nexus Mods has faced server strains due to newfound Fallout 4 popularity , millions of new downloads have been made because there are plenty of players who enjoy the interesting tweaks that mods make. During this surge of popularity, Bethesda rolled out a next gen update for Fallout 4 .

Related
Fallout: 7 Most Disturbing Characters, Ranked
The world of Fallout is a strange and twisted one, and it's suitably full of strange and twisted characters.

Fallout 4 's Next Gen update fixes a softlock concerning the character Codsworth. When players downloaded items from the Creation Club, which is the game's officially supported modding platform, a bug would initiate that would freeze Codsworth. As a result, it prevented many players from accessing early main quest content. If this bug was encountered, the only possible fix was to uninstall the game and any Creation Club items. Among other additions such as a performance and quality mode, the next-gen update for Fallout 4 gets rid of the Codsworth bug.

Fallout 4 Bug Fix Indicates A Promising Future

While players are thrilled to see this glaring issue resolved, some players are having issues with Fallout 4 's next-gen update . The new update is currently incompatible with F4SE, one of the most popular fan-made mods for the PC release, and players may just have to wait a little longer before those issues are resolved. Despite these issues, there are other mods that players can access from the next-gen update in the meantime, as it introduces new Creation Club content.

Overall, fans of Fallout seem to just be excited about the new attention the series is getting, and this excitement goes beyond the fans. Fallout creator Tim Cain has plenty of praise for the TV show and the massive amounts of detail that appear to have gone into adapting elements of the video games. As excitement for the series reaches a new peak, fans continue to look forward to hearing news about Fallout 5. That game is far off from seeing a release, and it is unlikely that any news on it will be shared soon, but now that there are more fans, even more people have joined in on the anticipation.

item.title: Pokemon GO Releases Free Special Research With Mythical Pokemon Encounter
item.description:
Highlights

  • Pokemon GO's new Special Research allows players to finally catch Diancie globally, starting May 1 at 10 am local time.
  • Diancie, a Mythical Pokemon from Gen 6, can also Mega Evolve with Diancite, and is linked to Carbink in a unique way.
  • Trainers who missed out on Diancie at Pokemon GO Fest 2023 now have a chance to add it to their collections.

Pokemon GO has released a new free Special Research that will finally make Diancie available globally. The most common way for Pokemon GO players to find Pokemon is in the wild, while it is possible to capture them in Raid Battles or hatch them from eggs. Some Pokemon are available for a limited time at events, and it takes time for them to reappear in Pokemon GO .

That's the case with Diancie, the Mythical Pokemon that Pokemon GO trainers saw for the first time during Pokemon GO Fest 2023 . On that occasion, Diancie could be caught only by Pokemon GO players who owned a special ticket for the in-person events in Osaka, New York, and London. Since then, Diancie hasn't appeared in any events, so Pokemon GO players have been waiting for another chance to find the Jewel Pokemon in Niantic's augmented reality game.

Related
Pokemon GO Announces New Hatch Day Featuring Baby Pokemon
Pokemon GO announces a new Hatch Day event, and this time it features an adorable baby Pokemon introduced in the early generations.

Pokemon GO has released a new free Special Research that includes an encounter with Diancie. Named Glitz and Glam, Pokemon GO trainers can claim the Special Research from May 1 at 10 am local time. Unlike other research, Diancie's will not expire, so players can complete it at any time. If the player has accessed the exclusive Pokemon GO Fest 2023 Special Research , completing this new research will give them Diancie Candy. From May 1, 12 am to May 3, 11:59 pm local time, players who spin Photo Discs and complete Field Research tasks will earn Diancie Mega Energy and encounters with Carbink.

When Will Diancie be Available for Free in Pokemon GO?

  • Starting Wednesday, May 1, at 10 am local time
  • How: Glitz and Glam Special Research reward

Diancie is a Mythical Pokemon first seen in Gen 6 that doesn't evolve from or into any Pokemon. Despite this, it's known that Diancie is born when the little Rock/Fairy-type Carbink undergoes a mysterious transformation and is therefore considered a distant relative of the Pokemon. Diancie can also access Mega Evolution through Diancite, gaining an even more majestic form worthy of a princess. Only available in the Gen 6 games, the only way for Pokemon players to play with Diancie in the Gen 9 titles is by transferring it using Pokemon Home.

That isn't the first time Pokemon GO has brought back a powerful monster, having released Shaymin globally in 2023 after its debut at Pokemon GO Fest 2022. As with Shaymin, Diancie's return is great news for trainers who couldn't attend the Pokemon GO Fest 2023 in-person events. While Niantic is giving all trainers the chance to add Diancie to their collections, players who attended the events in London, Osaka, and New York will still have a reason to claim the Special Research and get Diancie Candy.

item.title: Helldivers 2 Players Just Accomplished Something They Haven't Been Able to Do Since Launch
item.description:
Highlights

  • Helldivers 2 players achieved a major milestone by successfully defending 10 planets against enemy assault, a rare feat in the game.
  • Joel, an influencer in the game, directs enemy actions while Super Earth Command issues Major Orders to guide players in strategic campaigns.
  • Players' coordination and effort in focusing on one planet at a time led to the successful defense, earning praise from Super Earth High Command.

The soldiers of Super Earth have made major progress in the ongoing Helldivers 2 Galactic War by successfully defending a large number of planets from enemy assault. The feat hasn't been accomplished by the game's community since Helldivers 2 first launched in February 2024.

The centerpiece of the Helldivers 2 gameplay experience is the Galactic War, a massive, game-wide meta-campaign that involves every player simultaneously. Helldivers 2 players must "liberate" (read: conquer) planets in various sectors of a large galactic map by conducting combat operations there. Successful missions build progress on each planet in favor of Super Earth, while failed ones cause the enemy factions to gain ground, be they mechanical Automatons or ferocious Terminids. The Galactic War is influenced by an employee or group at Helldivers 2 developer Arrowhead Game Studios referred to by the name "Joel." Joel directs the actions of the in-game enemy faction, but also uses "Major Orders" issued by Super Earth Command to encourage players to defend or attack specific locations in pursuit of various goals.

Related
Rumor: Helldivers 2 Leak Shows New Exosuit Mech
A recent Helldivers 2 leak gives details about a brand-new exosuit stratagem, which may be added to Helldivers 2 in the future.

Thanks both to Joel's will and the collective actions of the Helldivers 2 playerbase, the Galactic War has seen a feat that hasn't been pulled off in multiple months since the game's original launch: A successful series of Helldivers 2 Defend campaigns in pursuit of a Major Order. A player on the game's Reddit community known as InkiePie39 excitedly highlighted this fact in a post following the Major Order's conclusion.

Helldivers 2 Players Successfully Defend Multiple Planets for the 1st Time Since Launch

The latest Major Order accomplished by Helldivers 2 players involved successfully defending no less than ten planets under siege by the Terminids and Automatons in the Galactic War. The order was issued by High Command on April 20, 2024, and gave Helldivers 2 players four days to accomplish the goal, incentivizing progress with a large cache of War Bond Medals. Medals are the main currency of Helldivers 2 progression, and are used to purchase new weapons and cosmetics from the game's periodic War Bond selections. These include new weapons like the Eruptor rifle from the latest Democratic Detonation War Bond .

Though multiple worlds were lost to the enemy, particularly the Automatons, the forces of Super Earth successfully defended planets the required number of times, holding the line on the worlds of Varylia 5 and Ustotu and restoring the tense stalemate that characterizes wartime on the Helldivers 2 Galactic Frontier . Super Earth High Command congratulated players in a message on the game's official Discord server posted on April 25, 2024. High Command praised the players' efforts, and in celebration, humorously allocated two extra minutes to all Helldivers' lunch break periods.

Players were quick to congratulate each other in the community on accomplishing the greater goal. The feat required a relatively high amount of coordination among players, as they needed to concentrate efforts on one planet at a time. Some also thanked Joel for seemingly tipping the scales somewhat in the order's final hours.

item.title: Apex Legends Disables Popular Character in Three Strikes Mode
item.description:
Highlights

  • Valkyrie has been removed from the Three Strikes LTM in Apex Legends due to a bug.
  • Respawn continues support for Season 21 with the Urban Assault Collection Event.
  • The removal of Valkyrie may impact the meta in the LTM, potentially boosting the popularity of Support Legends like Lifeline.

Respawn Entertainment has removed Valkyrie from the roster of playable characters in the Three Strikes LTM playlist in Apex Legends due to a bug. While this news will likely disappoint fans of the character, this should help create a more enjoyable gaming experience in the Apex Legends LTM, as this recent bug has caused many players to die while playing the mode.

While Season 21 of Apex Legends is already on the horizon, Respawn is not done supporting the current season with new content. Specifically, the developer launched the Urban Assault Collection Event in Apex Legends , adding new cosmetics and bringing back the fan-favorite Three Strikes LTM. While many players enjoy the mode, a previous bug impacting Valkyrie and those on her squad has reappeared. According to the community, this bug causes players to respawn at random locations on the map after dying if the Valkyrie on their team has previously used their Ultimate, Skyward Dive. Unsurprisingly, this has frustrated many in the games community, causing the developers to take action.

Related
All Apex Legends Currencies (& How to Get Them)
Discover the currencies of Apex Legends: Legends Tokens, Crafting Metals, Apex Coins, and Heirloom Shards. Learn their uses and acquisition methods.

In a recent message on Twitter, Respawn revealed that it had removed Valkyrie from the Three Strikes mode in Apex Legends . Unsurprisingly, the decision resulted from the Ultimate bug impacting the character, and the developer has said it will continue to investigate the cause of this problem as the character sits out of the LTM. It is worth mentioning that Valkyrie is still playable in other modes, such as Mixtape and Ranked.

Apex Legends Disables Valkyrie in Three Strikes

Unfortunately, Respawn did not reveal an expected timeframe for the reinstatement of the character in Three Strikes. However, this roster change could shake up the meta in the LTM. According to the Apex Legends Status database , Valkyrie is the most picked Legend in the game at 9.9%. As a result of her removal, Support Legends like Lifeline and Newcastle might rise even higher in popularity due to the fast revive mechanic in the game mode.

In addition, the removal of the character is more impactful, considering that Apex Legends introduced the new Rumble beta with the Urban Assault Collection Event. This addition to the game, described as an all-new asynchronous tournament system, utilizes the Three Strikes game mode, meaning those wanting to check out the beta will have one less Legend available to choose from when selecting their ideal team composition in Apex Legends .

Hopefully, Respawn can figure out a solution to the Valkyrie bug so that players can access all the playable characters in the LTM. With the two-week Urban Assault Collection Event having started on April 23, the Three Strikes mode in Apex Legends should remain available until May 6.

item.title: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Subscribers Can Get 3 Free Overwatch 2 Skins for a Limited Time
item.description:
Highlights

  • Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers can get 3 free Overwatch 2 skins until June 19.
  • Other benefits include skins for Exoprimal and NHL 24 bundle, Fallout 76 pack, and more.
  • The Redemption process expires on June 29. Find the bundle in the Xbox Game Pass tab.

Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers can redeem three free Overwatch 2 skins until June 19. Xbox Game Pass Ultimate is the most expensive tier of Xbox Game Pass, and Microsoft often adds various benefits for subscribers. These benefits allow subscribers to redeem in-game content across different titles like Overwatch 2 and free trials for several subscription services.

Currently, Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers can claim a kit with two exosuits and skins for Exoprimal and an NHL 24 bundle with items and players. Following the popularity of the Fallout TV show , subscribers can get a Fallout 76 pack with various items. Other Xbox Game Pass Ultimate benefits include an anniversary pack celebrating The Elder Scrolls Online 's tenth anniversary, and a monthly bonus on Phantasy Star Online 2 New Genesis . Adding to the list of benefits, Microsoft is now offering Overwatch 2 cosmetics, but players should act fast if they want to get this new perk.

Related
Overwatch 2: How to Use New Avoid Teammate System
Overwatch 2 devs have decided to rework the avoid teammate system, giving players more control over their settings.

Overwatch 2 is offering three free skins via Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Perks until June 19. The Season 10 Perks Bundle includes the Legendary skins Junker Queen Executioner and Medusa Widowmaker, one of Widow's best Overwatch 2 skins , and the epic skin Kiriko Visual Kei. It's important to note that Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers have until June 19 to claim the bundle code, and until June 29 to redeem the skins. To find the bundle, subscribers can go to the Xbox Game Pass tab of the app for PC and mobile, or via the Xbox dashboard.

Overwatch 2 Offers High-Tier Skins in Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Bundle

  • Junker Queen Executioner Legendary skin
  • Widowmaker Medusa Legendary skin
  • Kiriko Visual Kei Epic skin

The Junker Queen Executioner skin was added in 2022 with the announcement of the Halloween Terror event, which brought the Overwatch 2 Wrath of the Bride game mode , where players battled Sombra in her 'bride' skin. The Kiriko Visual Kei skin was also released in 2022, and gave the Overwatch 2 support a cosmetic inspired by the famous Japanese musical movement. Last year, it was the turn of the Medusa Widowmaker skin to be added to the hero shooter in conjunction with the Battle for Olympus event, transforming the sniper into the iconic creature from Greek mythology.

Overwatch 2 is in Season 10, and the bundle with the free Junker Queen, Widowmaker, and Kiriko skins is the latest way for players to get high-tier cosmetics for free. Previously, Overwatch 2 gave away a free Legendary Roadhog skin via Twitch Drops, while earlier this year, Amazon Prime Gaming offered subscribers the epic Rosewood Moira skin completely free of charge.
